original_text: The young men of Aven and of Pibeseth shall fall by the sword: and these cities shall go into captivity.
korean_text: 아웬과 비베셋의 장정들은 칼에 엎드러질 것이며 그 성읍 주민들은 포로가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: The young men of Aven and of Pibeseth shall fall by the sword:
sentences.korean_translation: 아벤과 피베셋의 청년들은 칼에 쓰러질 것이라

sentences.original_text: and these cities shall go into captivity.
